original_text: And the brethren immediately sent away Paul and Silas by night unto Berea: who coming thither went into the synagogue of the Jews.
korean_text: 밤에 형제들이 곧 바울과 실라를 베뢰아로 보내니 그들이 이르러 유대인의 회당에 들어가니라

sentences.original_text: And the brethren immediately sent away Paul and Silas
went into the synagogue of the Jews
